thumb.title: 友人のために「バカみたい」を歌う。Singing "Baka Mitai" for a friend.
thumb.description: A friend of mine, a famous chef from Japan, went to karaoke with his friends. He asked me to request a song that he wanted me to sing, so I requested a few. So, I thought I had to give it back, so I made a request. Have fun!A famous chef in Japan, who is a friend of mine, went out to karaoke with a friend of his. He told me to request songs for him to sing, so I requested a few. Then, I felt like I should return the favor, so I did. Enjoy!Sorry for the poor translation. I'm studying Japanese, so I'll use Google Translate for the time being. Thank you for watching!Sorry if this translation is not so good. I am learning Japanese, but for the time being, Google Translate will have to do. Thanks for watching!
